Name: Flutter
Ingredients: 25 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Three ingredients combine harmoniously and, depending on your coffee liqueur, perhaps just the merest tad on the sweet side.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2003 by Tony Coningliaro at Lonsdale House, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Flutter contains 200 calories
